texts.text: CU43 was a version of Xbox One Edition released on May 30, 2017.[1] [edit]

1 Additions
1.1 General
1.2 Blocks and items
2 Changes
2.1 General
2.2 Blocks and items
3 Fixes
4 See also
5 References

Adventure Time mash-up pack.
Magic: The Gathering skin pack.
Temple, a free Glide track.

Added Pick Block.
Unassigned by default.
Added off-hand slot for maps and arrows.

New note block sounds.
New sound effects for filling cauldrons, paddling boats, using a fishing rod and end portals.
Shulker boxes, shulker shells, iron nuggets, concrete powder, concrete, glazed terracotta

The default controls have been changed slightly and the player can now define their own control scheme with the new controls menu.
The player's best run in Glide will now be recorded (as long as it is under 5 minutes) and a ghost will fly alongside them in Solo Mode to help them improve.
Tooltips have been updated.

Iron and gold armor can now be smelted into nuggets.
More items can now be used as fuel in a furnace.
Using a firework while gliding with elytra will now give the player a boost
Changed the color of dyes, wool and banners

MCCE-2019 – Some times when shot with a arrow or hit the players screen will freeze or shake. please fix this
MCCE-2092 – Squids not spawning in anything man-made.
MCCE-2093 – Cannot move nor be seen
MCCE-2308 – Player glitched out in battle mode.
MCCE-3164 – Rabbits
MCCE-3953 – Intro/title screen shows menu and noise
MCCE-4223 – Elytra flight glitch
MCCE-4249 – D-Pad controls broken when using remote play feature on PSVita to play on PS4.
MCCE-4252 – Bow and arrow bug
MCCE-4278 – Banners are giant
MCCE-4544 – Take damage when falling into slime block
MCCE-4551 – Falling in shallow water is damaging players.
MCCE-4591 – Map directional icon skewed
MCCE-4604 – Battle Mode Spawn Glitch
MCCE-4662 – Exp from Coal not going to mending
MCCE-4667 – Odd splash screen glitch
MCCE-4670 – Items cannot be renamed
MCCE-4675 – Animation elytra in mobs
MCCE-4704 – Fall damage being taken in 1
